Joel shared Drift doc for fact-checking. Viktor corrected 13 factual errors and flagged 12+ items for review. Draft actively being worked on.
Joel listed Drift doc as top Saturday priority ('finish today'). Spent 11 AM refining arguments with Viktor — restructure suggested, math corrections identified. Still actively drafting.

Joel cross-referencing Drift doc claims at 4 PM GST, needs 30 more min. Chase thread tracking 4 PM deadline — Joel acknowledged delay. Saurabh missed revenue req (4 PM), chase thread handling with dork-label + 15-min reminders.

Viktor completed full Drift numerical review (5 math errors + 5 items to verify, added to doc). Joel took another round at Drift (~4:48 PM). Then shared a new doc (13xpMBH...) at 5 PM for flow/accuracy check — possibly final version. Joel + Saurabh syncing on call.

Joel standardized metrics and updated all numbers in Drift doc. New version: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Xw9FyIl2IvGf_2jyqt0LP0qO0_8ENQHCsiQEkmSQLoE/edit. Sunday schedule: 11:30 AM-1 PM GST for final review + updating team. Nearing completion.
